glosses: Often used in the imperative mood to indicate resignation and resentment about a situation that is already deteriorating to finally terminate itself; to be allowed to dissolve without any attempt to improve it; let the chips fall where they may.

etymology: Compound of incel- + -diğ + -i + yerden + kopmak, literally “for something to break at the point it thins down, as in rope; to snap from its weak point”.
